ModMetaData.name: Dubs Mint Menus Recipe Right Click Open InfoCard
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
给工作台的Dubs Mint Menus右边方格增加右键打开信息页的功能。配合上BetterInfoCard可以做到同时查看多个产物信息的效果。
Adds a right click action to the right side of the Dubs Mint Menus workbench to open the info card. If you have BetterInfoCard installed, you can open InfoCard for multiple products at the same time.
